document.full_text: general motors co  and chrysler group llc  have sued allied systems holding inc , accusing the auto hauler of "holding hostage" more than 2,400 new cars and trucks.
document.title: gm, chrysler sue allied over "hostage" vehicles
lines_and_colors: general motors co  and chrysler group llc  have sued allied systems holding inc , accusing the auto hauler of "holding hostage" more than 2,400 new cars and trucks.
